body:
Hello Everyone,



I'm been having some problems with the Outdoor Comfort Calculator tool: without doing anything, it says that the Calculation was terminated by the user...Is there something I'm doing wrong or is it something else?



I've seen this discussion in other components [here](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/pmv-calculator-warning-1-the-calculation-has-been-terminated-by), by I don't know if it's the same kind of problem



Thankyou very much in advance,



Pablo
topic: Outdoor Comfort Calculator -Calculation terminated by user
